inn1.comm: full and swinging into the blockhole, Kayes jams the bat down and squeezes it to mid-off
again swinging in but this time strays onto the pads, flicked to Ryder at midwicket
full outside off, Kayes moves onto the front foot and punches into the gap between mid-off and cover
beautifully driven straight back past the bowler by Nafees, it was full on off and swung in a touch but Nafees countered the swing beautifully
short on leg and tucked off the hip, fine leg runs around the edge of the circle to collect
short outside off, punched off the back foot to point
short and wide outside off, swinging further away after pitching, batsman leaves it alone for the expected wide
much better line, fast and straight with a touch of away swing, defended back down the pitch
excellent from McKay, pitched just outside off and moved away late to beat the attempted forward defensive
short on middle and off, goes back and defends solidly into the covers
full on off stump, played into the ground, McKay jumps high and gets a hand to it to prevent thoughts of a single
interesting leave from Nafees, pitched on off, narrowly missed the pad and swung away after passing the batsman
full on off and squeezed out square on the off side out into the deep
short on off, defended down and into the off side
again short but this well outside off, left alone
short on leg, Nafees is off-balance trying to pull, hand comes off the bat handle but he gets enough bat to beat a diving fine leg, slice of fortune there for Nafees
fuller but on the pads, clipped into the square leg region
short but closer to off, extra bounce beats Kayes who pushes the bat out and then withdraws
similar delivery but Kayes gets bat behind ball and angles it down to third man
short and down leg, beats the attempted flick and strikes the pad, rolls to fine leg
low bounce does for Nafees! pitched outside off and darted back in low to beat Nafees' attempted prod, struck on the kneeroll on middle and leg, possibly going on to hit leg
short on leg, ducks underneath as it swings down leg
McKay moving it both ways, classical left-armer's swing, pitching full outside off and beating the attempted drive with movement away
short outside off, cut uppishly into the deep at third man
goes for the cut again and misses, this one was closer to the off stump with no movement
short on middle, Kayes is squared up and edges the defensive stroke on the bounce to slip
this was short as well but with no menace, rocks back and pulls handsomely over square leg. The umpires go upstairs to check four or six, it hit the ropes on the full so first six of the game
charges down the wicket wildly and plays a mad swat, luckily misses the full ball outside off
nice delivery, pitches on off and moves away, Kayes again prods without moving his feet and misses
in the same area, Kayes partly edges and partly opens the face on it, goes on the bounce to slip who fumbles but no opportunity for a single
full on middle and leg, flicked down to a diving mid-on
strays onto the pads with a short of a length delivery, clipped away into the square leg region where Watling makes good ground
chops the attempted cut into the ground, short and wide outside off, should have been put away
played down to third man, again outside off
punched off the front foot into the covers, committed fielding on the boundary saves one
slower ball draws Kayes into a stuttering forward movement, unconvincingly defends almost off-balance
excellent yorker from McKay, Kayes jams it into his pad where it fortunately rolls into the off side, that almost got through
sweetly times the pull out towards square leg, that was short on middle and off
again short outside off, carved down to third man
on the leg stump, tries the customary flick, gets a leading edge that swirls around for a long time, Vettori does well to take the catch and hold on after tumbling awkwardly
on off stump, tentatively defended into his pad
short on leg and swinging further down, Raqibul pulls everything out of the way as a wide is given
fuller and outside off, driven to the left of cover who does well to adjust to the ball quickly changing direction with an athletic diving save
defends a back of a length delivery into the covers
short and down leg, hits the pad and beats McCullum who dives in vain
again short and down leg, this time Kayes gets bat to ball and flips it past fine leg who is up in the circle
corrects the line and puts it outside off but again short, punched into the covers while standing tall
welcome dot ball for McKay, slower ball outside off, Kayes waits and opens the face to play it to point
full and straight, flicked to mid-on
half-volley outside off which is pushed to mid-off, quick single taken
Kiwis persisting with short lengths and being punished for it, outside off, uses the pace and glides it down to the third man boundary
outside off and beats the defensive jab, full length
too full outside off but only squeezed out to point
short of a length on off, wristily worked to midwicket
more punishment for New Zealand, very short and wide, Kayes throws the kitchen sink at it and flays it through point
fuller on middle and leg, hint of a leading edge as he defends to short cover
Perfect start, bustles in and outside off, beats the defensive stroke and moves back in
pacy on middle and off, Raqibul hops back to defend
good movement into the right-hander, outside off and left alone despite moving close to the off stump
this time gets it to cut away from Raqibul's defensive push outside off
gets bat on ball this time with a firm punch back down the wicket to a ball on middle and off
fuller and outside off, punched unconvincingly on the up down to mid-on, lack of timing enables the quick single
lovely, tossed up on off and spins well past the attempted defensive push
defends with the outer half of the bat to third man
plays back down the pitch
comes down and reaches for the drive, thick outside edge past slip
sweeps a full ball out to deep backward square
short on off, Kayes defends into the pitch
strays well down leg this time, comfortably past Kayes' flick, wide called
full on middle and leg, defends to short midwicket
on middle and off, textbook front foot defence from Kayes
again defends a delivery on middle and leg, Bennett testing Kayes
pulls back the length a touch, wristed from on off stump to midwicket
fuller outside off, punches a drive through Raqibul's legs
outside off and comes back in, clipped to midwicket
tossed up on leg and spins further down, beats the booming sweep, wide given
goes back and defends a ball on leg airily but safely on the bounce to square leg
charges down and drills to long-on, Mills dives to prevent four
on leg stump, Kayes leaves and is hit on the pad
flighted outside off, wide mid-on collects the attempted drive
pushed through flatter and faster outside off, walks across and flicks with no power or timing into the leg side
angled into Raqibul who works it to midwicket
puts it wide of off and tempts the batsman into an indiscretion, misses the cover drive by a fair margin
on leg, clipped softly into the leg side, Raqibul sets off quickly, Imrul is slow to respond but nevertheless beats the direct hit at the striker's end, Aleem Dar has no need to refer
bouncer outside leg and moves violently to off past the attempted hook
fuller outside off with no movement, Kayes defends with the full face into the off side
half-tracker on leg lacking the pace of Bennett's earlier deliveries, plays his favourite pick-up shot and comfortably clears square leg
pushed into the covers
outside off, goes for the big sweep and makes no contact
goes back and works against the turn to midwicket
Raqibul's scratchy innings is ended by a loose dab cut to a ball on middle and off, chops it on
well down leg, half-hearted work to leg makes no contact
goes across and lap sweeps a full ball on off down to fine leg, innovation earl on from Shakib
a more conventional forward defensive to finish the over
fired into middle and leg, dug out back to the bowler
comes forward and defends to off
goes for the reverse sweep, misses and the ball beats a surprised McCullum, they race through for a bye but a direct hit would have seen Kayes on his way
inside edges a short ball on middle behind square on the leg side
on off and decent spin away, worked from outside off to leg
goes for the slog sweep and skies it high towards cow corner, safely out of the fielder's reach
outside off and clipped to leg
flighted fuller, again worked to leg
pushed through on leg, going on, beats the sweep and the finger is up in a flash
tossed up outside off and carved to backward point
tossed up on middle, easily worked past midwicket
tossed up down leg, worked to fine leg
outside off, squeezes a cut into the deep
fast and straight on middle, worked to midwicket
down leg, goes for the sweep, gets a touch on the glove which beats the keeper and goes down to fine leg
more air outside off, punched off the back foot to short cover
this time comes forward to repeat the stroke
clips a delivery outside off into the vacant square leg region
hit out to deep backward square
again down leg, Mushfiqur helps it on its way but straight to fine leg
goes back and jabs it to point
comes down and tries to defend, hit on the pad, hint of inside edge as well
outside off, drifts in, pushes away from the body into the covers
goes back and cuts to the off-side sweeper
outside off and swings away, top edges the drive to third man
comes back into the left-hander on off stump, Shakib makes room and chops down to third man
starts outside off and swings away, left alone
similar to the previous delivery but a touch wider and fuller, can't resist the bent knee drive but misses
this time goes on with the angle, goes back and punches to the off-side sweeper
loud appeal for lbw, it started on off and hit the pad in line with leg, looked to be going down
on leg, pushed to mid-off
nicely comes down the wicket and hits over the mid-on fielder with ease
excellent riposte from Vettori, on off and spins away with extra bounce to beat the fend
goes back and defends
dabs a late cut to third man, almost out of the keeper's gloves
fired in on middle, goes back and works to the fielder in the deep on the leg side
nice in-swing, Shakib's drive is jarred as a result
shorter outside off, comes in but enough room for Shakib to dab to third man
outside off and leans into the drive, not all that well timed but enough to make it into the deep
short outside off but with extra pace, beats Shakib's slash
again moves into the left-hander from just short of a length outside off, squeezed to point
identical delivery but this time Shakib angles the dab better to pick up a single, 100 up for Bangladesh as the second drinks break arrives
Shakib punches from off stump to point
wrong line there, on the pads and flicked fine, McKay dives well to prevent a boundary
shorter on leg, again tries to work fine but is hit high on the pads
fuller and tailing away, jammed out to mid-on
full outside off, digs it out to cover
pulls the length back and is guided to third man
excellent yorker tailing into leg stump and Shakib also does well to keep it out

outside off, delectable cover drive which embarrassingly goes straight through the fielder's legs, Elliott gives it a hard chase and dives valiantly on the boundary, umpires go upstairs to check and he is deemed to have prevented four
short on middle and off, goes back and defends
same routine followed by both batsman and bowler
outside off, defends with soft hands down to third man, mixture of edge and control
tails down leg and hits the pad, McCullum fumbles and they race through
on leg, beats the wristy flip and rolls off the pad towards square leg
comes forward and punches a back of a length delivery to mid-off
short and wide outside off, Bennett's figures ruined a touch by a fierce slash to the point boundary
defends into the off side
short and wide outside off, well timed drive into the deep
on the pads and flicked to fine leg
chopped to third man
on middle and off, clipped towards mid-on
worked to square leg off a similar delivery
charges down and hits over the top of cover, not much elevation but still enough to clear the heads of the fieldsmen, good use of the feet again from the diminutive keeper
worked into the leg side to long-on
down leg, Shakib nudges to the right of fine leg
whippily slapped to cover
slower ball, mistimed to mid-off
shorter, flashes an edgy cut very fine past McCullum down to the third man fence
squeezes out a short ball to cover
fuller on middle and leg, Shakib moves across and flicks towards backwards square leg
short and wide outside off, Mushfiqur misses out, whacked straight to point
goes back and adjusts to the low bounce outside off, worked to cover
full on middle and jammed out well by Shakib
goes back and clips into the empty spaces on the leg side, the bowler ends up jogging across to do the fielding
tossed up outside off, drives back down the pitch
flighted up, goes forward and then shifts back to carve it backward of point
on middle and leg, worked with simplicity to the leg-side sweeper
excellent slower ball which fools Shakib who came down and missed a gigantic heave
pushed more sedately into the covers
chopped into the ground, ball bobbles over the stumps and dribbles to the keeper
goes back to pull but the lack of pace means limited timing, enough for a couple though

on leg, pick-up stroke is significantly better timed but straight into the hands of Williamson at deep square leg who dives forward. He is unsure if the ball has carried, the umpires go upstairs. Replays are inconclusive. And against the benefit of the doubt, Shakib is sent on his way!! Massive blow for New Zealand, Shakib has been a real thorn in their plans this series, they will be more than happy to see the back of him. Bangladesh's hopes of a competitive total decrease significantly
goes back and pulls away along the ground
flicked off the front foot to square leg
dragged short but the pull behind square is not all that well timed, the bowler escapes with only one conceded
fired into middle, clipped to wide mid-on
comes forward to defend to leg
defends into the off side, sets off but is wisely sent back
spins down leg past the batsman who tucks the bat behind pad
goes back and away, has to reach for it but gets enough bat with the cut shot to beat the fielders down to the backward point fence
excellent slog sweep to a full ball on middle and off, reaches the fence with ease
driven to long-on
angled into middle and leg, squeezes it out
comes forward and defends with soft hands
arm ball on middle, jabbed into the covers
inside edges the block into the leg side
outside off and beats the attempted dab
mistimes the drive back down the pitch
defends into the leg side
defends with an open face to point who dives to prevent the single
superb slower delivery from Elliott, Mushfiqur was early on the shot and misses the drive, cuts back in and keeps low to hit middle, New Zealand start to consolidate their grip on the game
on the pads and worked to short midwicket, fantastic wicket maiden from Elliott
tossed up on off, defended
tries to drive a full one, only goes back to Vettori
defends softly to off
goes back and cuts a short ball outside off to the left of the cover sweeper
again defends to cover
defends to point with the outer half of the bat
jabs it to short midwicket
full and wide outside off, can't beat point with the square drive
defends down the pitch
more canny use of the slower ball, beats the attempted drive
even better slower ball, back of the hand, draws a befuddled Shuvo forward, beats the forward defensive
this time gets bat on ball but not past the ring, another maiden from Elliott who has done a great job for his captain
gentle loosener first up, outside off and moves away, left alone
short on middle, goes back to defend
back of a length outside off, moves in a touch but not enough to prevent the batsman offering no stroke
full outside off and moves away, beats the defensive push away from the body, big appeal from bowler and keeper but umpire unmoved
on the pads and flicked to deep fine leg
slants across the left-hander, left alone
full outside off, defends on the front foot
misdirected short ball very wide of off, totally miscues the cut into the pitch block, would have been a wide if left alone
big Jesse pulls off a super save, cut to his right, dives and prevents the ball getting past with a big paw to it
short ball outside off, tries to duck but it doesn't get up at all, ends up going through at chest height through to the keeper
that one certainly got up, Mahmudullah yanks his head out of the oncoming missile's way as it hones in at his head
this time safely ducks underneath
defends back down the track
outside off, dabbed into the covers to open his account
tries to blast a delivery on middle through midwicket, average timing and luckily bisects the midwicket and mid-on fielders
jabs at a ball moving away outside off, misses
good short ball directed at the head, Shuvo turns his eyes away and ducks just out of the ball's direction
goes back and defends to cover
short ball outside off, goes for the booming back-foot drive, gets a thick edge past the dive of a despairing McCullum, also beats the boundary rider
full on leg, clipped fine and Mills puts in a valiant dive and flicks it back, umpires go upstairs to check if his foot was touching the rope, again the fielder is given the benefit of the doubt
outside off, gives some room and glides to third man
angles into the pads, Shuvo ekes it out to square leg
another well-directed short delivery, on middle and forcing the batsman to duck
repeats the dose, this time the ball sails over the off stump
outside off and going across, flashes at it and misses
squeezes a short ball on leg into the midwicket region
strays on the pads and is worked to fine leg
angled in and defends to mid-on
short and angling into leg, clipped away, Nathan McCullum hits the stumps at the striker's end direct but Shuvo is safely in his crease
poor way to go, short ball on leg, Shuvo tries to extract his gloves from the situation but can only get a faint touch through to Brendon McCullum
outside off and no shot offered
angles a full ball into leg, gets the back leg out of the way and works to mid-on
outside off and comes back in, again leaves
short outside off and moving away, Mahmudullah is having nothing to do with it
moves outside off and wristily flicks but straight to mid-on
again banged in outside off but too wide to play
punches a full ball to the left of mid-off, tight single taken with the throw off-target
beautifully bowled, flighted on off and drifts into middle, beats the attempted work to leg and strikes him dead in front. Vettoir picks up his third wicket
outside off, driven to the cover sweeper
drives on the up to long-on
inside edge saves Shafiul, similar delivery to the Mahmudullah dismissal
arm ball on middle, squeezed out to mid-off
completely slows up the pace on this one, waits for an age before nervously coming forward and defending
distinctly club-standard there, slow loopy full toss which goes miles down leg
much better, full outside off and late in-swing, bat hits the ground but makes no contact with ball
goes for a slog to leg, swings in and Razzak Chinese cuts past a diving keeper
comes in with the angle and moves away late but a full toss outside off is bunted to the cover sweeper
thin snick behind, Razzak flails the bat at a short delivery outside off to the detriment of his batting average and his team
full and fast on middle, Rubel defends in MCC textbook fashion
short on the stumps but well negotiated by Rubel, who jumps back and defends with soft hands
beautiful deception, tossed up and beats the attempted chop to third man, loud appeal as he is rapped on the pad, umpire declines
comes down and swings to the leg-side sweeper
more excellent spin bowling, spins past the outer edge
gets a leading edge which is safely away from cover
goes for a huge swing and is 10 seconds early as it is well tossed up, ball misses the bat and somehow the stumps as it just sneaks past
again tossed up but this time outside off allowing Shafiul to wait and jab a cut into the deep
beats Shafiul for pace with a full and fast delivery outside off angling in
backs away and squirts a shortish ball outside off to point
very short outside off and moves away considerably, wided for his troubles
backs away and gropes at a ball on middle that angles away, fizzes over the top of the stumps
flashes a square drive off the outer edge to third man
full toss on middle below the waist, leading edge which is yet again safely in the gap on the off side

almost a run-out as the full toss is bunted to mid-on, Shafiul sets off but Rubel is not interested, Shafiul does a u-turn and beats the throw to the keeper, it would have interesting had there been a direct hit
going down leg, raps him on the back pad
goes for an agricultural slog, hits it miles but only in height rather than distance, Watling settles under it and takes the catch with ease. Bangladesh all out for 174

inn2.comm: full and outside off, driven to mid-off, sets off for a run and narrowly beats the throw at the non-striker's end
very wide outside off stump, Ryder sensibly leaves
on the pads, clipped away out to deep square leg
moves away outside off, McCullum reaches and opens the face to guide to third man
good line and length, full and straight, defends stoutly down the wicket
shorter and on off this time, Ryder uses the wrists to nudge into the leg side
angling down leg, McCullum misses the flick and is hit on the pad, rolls into the leg side
short outside off, McCullum cuts it away to deep third man

oh dear! McCullum has a severe brain freeze, looks to play his rock-back pull over midwicket but doesn't move his feet into the right position, skies up a dolly for mid-off. New Zealand make an extremely poor start
angles the full delivery into Ryder's toes, jams it into his pads
outside off, punched to mid-off
short on leg, goes backs and plays a flick-cum-pull out to the leg-side sweeper

more problems for New Zealand, pitched on leg and hits him on middle, Ryder's feet were glued to the crease as he played a nothing shot, finger goes up and the explosive openers have both had their involvement in the game ended within the first two overs
outside off and left alone
angled into middle, inside edges the defensive stroke into the gap on the leg side
over-enthusiasm there, fires a short ball way down leg
nudged to square leg off the front foot
short on off, defends off the outer half of the bat into the off side
nicely driven on the up but straight to mid-off
comes from very wide of the crease a la Makhaya Ntini, full and angled into middle and leg, Taylor keeps it out
Watling goes back to defend a short ball on off
this time comes forward to defend into the off side
shorter and shifted wider of off, comes back in and Watling guides to point against the angle
this time punches to cover
this time the punch goes to point, outside edge involved
excellent inswinging yorker which Watling jams out from underneath himself at the last moment, maiden from Rubel as Bangladesh pile the pressure on
down leg, doesn't spin back and beats the flick

well outside leg, clipped into the deep, a misfield convinces them to race back for two and the stumps are broken with Watling struggling to make his ground. Aleem Dar goes upstairs, the issue is whether Razzak (who dropped the ball) has knocked the bails off with his hands first or if he has dropped the ball into the stumps before his hands made contact. And the verdict is... GONE! New Zealand stumbling badly
driven to the left of Razzak, who gets a hand to it but can't prevent the single
the new man defends to leg first up
that turned from outside leg, hits the edge of Williamson's bat and rolls to point
comes from wide of the crease, goes on and hits Williamson on the pad around middle and leg, close call but umpire turns down the appeal
paddle sweeps fine but doesn't beat fine leg
short on off, Taylor pinned back, defends
Taylor clips to mid-on and races out of the blocks, Shakib's throw narrowly misses the stumps with Taylor possibly home but again a tight single
defends into the leg side off the back foot

the centurion from the last game departs for a duck!! short outside off, tried to punch off the back foot but could only get a thick edge to second slip who went low to his left and held on well. Just when New Zealand thought things couldn't get any worse...
clipped off the pads into the leg side
flip-pulled off the pads down to fine leg
outside off and flicked to short midwicket
goes back and clips to deep square leg

brilliant from Razzak! Around the wicket, the arm ball going straight on, Taylor plays for the non-existent turn and leaves a huge gap between bat and pad. The ball is only too happy to take advantage and crash into the off stump. New Zealand staggering like a drunkard here
down leg, Elliott over-balances but the keeper can't collect cleanly, wide not given
defends with a straight bat
comes down and pushes to short cover who sends Elliott scurrying back into his crease like a crab
props forward to push to mid-off
on middle and leg, Vettori brings the backlift down from outside off but still squeezes it to short midwicket
very full outside off, beats Vettori's dab and hits a foothole, rears up over the keeper and slips to the third man boundary
works down to fine leg
slower ball on middle, Elliott inside edges to the leg side
pushed out to cover
worked to mid-on
Vettori pushes out expecting the turn, it doesn't and beats the outside edge
comes down and punches into the covers
tossed up on leg and this one does turn, Elliott defends
leans forward to defend on off stump
fired in down leg, beats batsman and keeper, they scamper one in addition to the wide
takes a step down and pokes it through the covers
strays onto the pads with a full toss which Elliott nicely flicks to the midwicket boundary
defends back down the track
repeats the stroke
achieves a hat-trick of defensive strokes into the off side
full outside off and Elliott changes tack by letting it go
plays a drive to point. Drinks arrives and couldn't come faster for New Zealand who have been appalling in the opening Powerplay
tossed up on middle, Vettori whips it out to deep midwicket
Elliott defends down the track
Elliott takes a step down to drive and inside-edges out to deep backward square
advances and defends back to Razzak
more whippy flicking to mid-on
gets down and sweeps backward of square
slower ball on off, Vettori waits and works to point
ramrod-straight delivery on off, pushes back down the track
moves across and works to mid-on
well-directed bouncer, one for the over, which Vettori gets well underneath
wristed to mid-on
outside off and Vettori back-cuts down to third man
Vettori defends tentatively
down leg and clipped behind square
starts from outside off and spins down leg past the batsman
nudged off middle stump out to deep square leg
goes back and flicks to midwicket
this time tries to beat midwicket with a flick to his right but the fielder runs around to cut it off

dropped! Vettori stabbed at a ball outside off and got a thick edge to the left of Siddique who spilled it and tried to have a second go but couldn't reach it, a huge let-off for New Zealand who should have had their coffin receive an extra nail
defends
comes down and pushes to long-off
flicked to the right of mid-on who dives well and cuts it off
goes back and pushes back down the track
leans forward to defend into the covers
beats the ring and flicks into the deep on the leg side
goes back and nudges to leg
bit of turn there, Vettori slightly squared up as he defends to off
defends on the front foot
Vettori gets down for the sweep and inside edges into his back pad, appeal turned down
comes forward and defends
short outside off and chopped away through backward point
around the wicket to Elliott who gets well forward to defend
bit of inside edge with the forward defensive
nurdles this into the leg side
comes down and flicks to long-on
drives back down the pitch
huge appeal but Elliott stretches well forward and makes sure he is struck outside the line of off
is pinned back in the crease and defends
tries to work a single but picks out point
slog sweeps out to cow corner, lands safely but plugs in the outfield
goes forward but plays to leg from the crease
well outside off, really has to reach for the sweep with a full extension of the arms, beats midwicket and goes into the deep
comes down and flicks in the air but safely short of midwicket
around the wicket to the left-hander, goes back and flicks behind square
chops a cut to point
tries to go for a drive but tamely digs out a fullish delivery
flicked into the deep on the leg side off middle stump
tries to sweep a ball outside off against the angle but with the spin, misses
pushed to long-on
props forward to defend
tries to nudge a single but can only defend to cover
keeps low and squeezes out back down the pitch
comes forward and pushes into the off side, sets off quickly and Eliiott beats the throw into the keeper
tossed up outside off, thick outside edge all along the carpet down to third man. 55 for 5
pushes to mid-on
Elliott moves onto the front foot and defends
excellent cut by Elliott, went back to a short ball on off which spun away a touch, middled to the backward point fence
sweeps to the left of the leg-side sweeper, return for a couple
down leg, Elliott rolls the wrists on the sweep but picks out fine leg
punched into the off side, bowler runs across and dives well to save a run
worked into the leg side
spins into Elliott who clips it to square leg
down leg, wide
defends into the block
goes back and stays low to defend, covering the low bounce
comes down and nudges a single to long-on
quickly onto the front foot, waits for the ball to arrive and then defends
sweeps to deep backward square
comes down and flicks to short midwicket
dabs to point
late cuts on the bounce to slip
sweeps in the air on the bounce to deep square leg
presses forward to defend textbook style
positive use of the feet yields a positive result, chips down and clears mid-on with a delectable loft
punches to cover
goes back and works to mid-on
swipe-sweeps out into the deep on the leg side
comes down again but this time keeps it on the ground and works to long-on
leans forward and defends
swept to the left of square leg who can't prevent a quick run
goes back and flicks into the leg side
comes down and swipes to long-on
pins Elliott in the crease, jabs it out to the off side
on leg and flicked to deep square leg
fires in a flatter and faster ball, which would have been fine except that it was miles down leg and beat the keeper, 5 wides
comes down and digs it out to midwicket
slight change in the action as he tries to impart more conventional spin, Vettori plays into the covers
drives back down the pitch
worked to the right of midwicket, Elliott set off but was sent back by his skipper, probably a single there but caution understandable after the Watling run-out
goes back and cuts out towards the boundary, two fielders chase to prevent the boundary
worked into the leg side
nudged to fine leg
clipped off middle stump straight to midwicket
comes down to flick, misses and is hit on the pad
comes down again and this time connects with the flick to long-on
down leg, nudged into a gap on the leg side
goes back and works to the right of midwicket

tossed up on leg and Elliott goes for the on-drive but hits it on the bounce to the left of a mid-on who dives spectacularly and causes a bit of confusion in the running before Vettori makes it to the striker's end
Vettori comes down and decides to launch it high and handsomely over the long-on boundary, much needed runs for New Zealand
Shakib fires it down leg past Elliott's flick
on middle and Elliott respectfully defends
goes back and clips straight to Shuvo at fine leg
goes back and works to midwicket
again goes back, this time hits to mid-on
worked to square leg
drives back down the track
slow bouncer outside off and Vettori wields the bat high over his head and swings it like an axe, the ball races to the midwicket boundary
defends into the off side
outside off and moves away a touch which doesn't bother Vettori as he dabs to third man to bring up the 100, a score which looked a long way off from the depths of 20 for 5
opens the face and guides to point
wider of off and Elliott glides it to third man
full ball outside off, jammed into the ground and out to point
Shakib slides it down leg and Elliott displays exquisite timing in placing it into the gap and then beating the boundary rider on the leg side
floated up and Elliott reaches, hits with the toe to cover
nudges to leg
defends with firm hands
nudged to fine leg
opens the face and works to cover
goes back to a ball that keeps a bit low on leg stump and works it into the deep
outside off, punched into the ground and then to cover
driven to point on the up
accurate delivery, outside off and comes in, Elliott does his best Rahul Dravid impersonation in defending straight back
nice straight drive but excellent stop off his own bowling by Rubel
rolls the fingers across that one, Elliott is content to defend
comes down and then has to adjust to Shakib shortening the length, can only defend
arm ball outside off, misses the late cut

the game swings back Bangladesh's way!! Vettori came down and played his short-arm jab aerial flick into the deep on the leg side, midwicket sweeper came round and dived forward to hold onto a well-judged and vital catch
down leg, Elliott hit on the pad
worked into the square leg area
walks across and defends
swings into middle stump and flicks it off his toes to midwicket
short outside off, punched back down the pitch
clipped down to fine leg
full on off, defends with the full face
short outside off, sways out of the line
middles the square drive but straight to point
leans forward and defends solidly
goes back and punches to short cover
fired into the pads, Elliott responds with a lovely on-drive which races away to the boundary
takes a step down and lofts inside out over the ring fielders on the off side, determined running sees them acquire three
again takes a huge stride across the crease and defends
full toss outside off which is not fully timed but has enough legs on it for the batsmen to pick up another three
on off, tries to make room but plays the drive with the bottom of the bat, goes to point
full and straight, raps him on the back pad, loud appeal for lbw but going down leg
this time he adjusts and plays with the swing to mid-on

short and wide outside off, McCullum tried to hook from outside off, got big on him, top edged it into the vacant square leg area, the keeper and Siddique run around to try and take the catch, Siddique is the one who gets there with both hands but he drops a catch for the second time today
dug out to mid-off
punched into the covers
again moves across and defends into the off side
fired into middle, defends with the inner half of the bat to leg
tossed up, opened up and thought about going leg side but then at the last moment tried to dab with the turn, misses
worked in the air to midwicket

gone! McCullum doesn't make Bangladesh pay for the dropped catch, comes down the track and tries to hit to leg against the turn, except that this one goes straight on with low bounde and smacks into middle stump. Bangladesh edge closer to the whitewash
left alone outside off
comes forward and pushes back
goes back to the arm ball and squeezes it to mid-on
shimmies down and nudges behind square on the leg side
full on middle and turning away, defends with the outer edge
punched to cover
goes back and clips into the deep off the pads, strong running earns them two
tossed up on leg and clipped to midwicket
paddle sweeps very fine past fine leg for a couple
swings the sweep over the boundary rider's head for four, the fielder came in and misjudged the distance as it just evaded his reach, an angry Shakib mutters
clipped into the leg side to bring up a 50 which has kept New Zealand alive
goes on with the arm, struck on the pad and appeal from Shakib but going down leg
defends into the off side
tossed up outside off stump and drives down to long-off
comes forward to defend
pulls the length back, Mills also goes back and works to fine leg
props forward to defend
hangs in the crease but again defends
appeal for lbw but going down leg, struck on the pad attempting to flick
fired into leg, worked down to long-on
tossed up, inside edges into the pad on leg stump
comes forward and defends to off
drew Mills forward and then beat the outside edge with some turn away
goes back and tucks fine past the keeper, Elliott hares back for the third
leans back and carves out to deep point, Shakib finishes his spell
pitches outside off and rips away from the right-hander, Elliott was well away from that
worked to midwicket
goes back and cuts to point
props forward and defends
advances down the wicket and pushes to long-off
defends directly to cover
defends into the off side
cuts to point off the back foot
swept off middle stump into the deep
tossed up outside off, spins away and keeps low to beat the attempted cut
good stride forward into the ball to defend
comes down and aims up a swing to midwicket, inside edges along the ground out to deep backward square
short outside off, Mills goes back and times it well but straight to cover
pops forward and plays with a straight bat
angled into leg, worked with that angle into the wide open spaces on the leg side
comes down and drives back to the bowler who whizzes a throw into the keeper
down leg, Elliott sweeps very well along the ground and backward of square for a welcome boundary for the Kiwis
pushed into the covers
outside off and spins, this time bounces more than expected, beats the cut
defends to leg
goes down to sweep, mixture of bat and pad trickles to fine leg
short outside off, Mills goes for the booming cut and chops it into the pitch
worked into the leg side
comes down and almost yorks himself, angled into the batsman, squeezed out to short leg
goes back, stands tall and smacks out to long-off
leans back and plays to cover

is that the death knell for New Zealand? goes for the big slog sweep and top-edges against the turn with absolutely no timing, Rubel takes a sitter at wide mid-on, needless stroke after the patient buildup, puts bangladesh firmly in the box seat
gets forward to defend
tries to work to leg and gets a leading edge along the ground back to the bowler
reverts to get forward and block mode
McKay gets forward late and defends
goes back and plays an attractive drive to cover
going down leg, beats the defensive stroke and hits on the pad, bobs up to silly mid-on, raucous appeals and celebrations which are deflated by the umpire who doesn't agree
props forward on middle to defend
full toss fired into leg, hits McKay on the foot

Bangladesh become firm favourites to wrap this up, McKay leaned forward to a ball that pitched on middle and leg but came back towards the stumps, struck him in front, umpire had little choice other than to raise the dreaded finger
misses the cut outside off
goes back and hits to long-off, declines the single as the RRR goes to more than a run-a-ball
comes down the track and tries to heave the slog sweep into orbit, misses and appeal for a stumping. Goes upstairs, Mills slides his foot back in a fraction before the bails are whipped off
achieves what he was trying to do, comes down and lofts with precision over the bowler's head, much better stroke than the previous heave
goes back and works to square leg
can't retain the strike, tries to drive through the gap at cover but picks out point, Bennett exposed for the next over
outside off, Bennett tries to defend without moving the feet and gets nowhere near it
excellent delivery, fired in fuller as Bennett tried to get a positive stride in, again beaten
beaten yet again, identical to the previous delivery
finally gets bat on ball, worked to midwicket
does so again

fired in outside off, beats Bennett and Mushfiqur can only deflect it down to fine leg, Mills scampers madly as Bennett takes a while to get the wheels going, come back for two but not without difficulty as Bennett beats the wide throw
backs away and Rubel follows, hit on the toes
backs away and again Rubel follows but this time serves up a juicy full toss, Mills swings and helps it on its way to the backward square leg boundary
backs away again, good yorker on middle, dug out down to long-on, Bennett thinks about two but Mills sends him back
defends to point
full on middle and off, Bennett jams the bat low and keeps it out
on leg, Bennett again keeps low and keeps it out
Mills backs away and top edges it over cover for a couple, he aimed up that area as all the off side fielders are in the circle due to the Powerplay
short outside off, Mills again gives himself room and flamboyantly slams it over cover to bring the equation back to under a run-a-ball
better delivery, full and tailing in, hits Mills on the foot outside leg stump
again full on leg, digs out a single down to long-on. 8 from 8
slower ball on the stumps but Bennett is not deceived, waits for it and defends to mid-on. Can he survive the last ball?
fired in full, Bennett keeps it out
horrendous delivery as the pressure gets to Rubel, tries to follow Mills down leg but serves up a waist-high full toss which is flicked over the in-field to the boundary
goes for the big swing to midwicket but is followed again, this time Rubel gets it right and fires it in at the toes, misses and is hit on the pad

cleaned out!! Bangladesh win the series 4-0 and achieve what Athar Ali Khan has called the 'Banglawash'! Mills backed away, Rubel fired in a perfect yorker on leg stump and sent it cartwheeling. The players then chased madly after each other in wild celebration as New Zealand suffer complete ignominy
